scripts.gen:presents: npm run gen:present-green-cube && npm run gen:present-green-rectangle && npm run gen:present-green-round
scripts.gen:box-large: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/box_large.glb --output generated_components/box_large.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/box_large.tsx
scripts.gen:box-wide: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/box_wide.glb --output generated_components/box_wide.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/box_wide.tsx
scripts.gen:box-small: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/box_small.glb --output generated_components/box_small.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/box_small.tsx
scripts.gen:box-long: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/box_long.glb --output generated_components/box_long.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/box_long.tsx
scripts.gen:boxes: npm run gen:box-large && npm run gen:box-wide && npm run gen:box-small && npm run gen:box-long
scripts.gen:arrow: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/arrow.glb --output generated_components/arrow.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/arrow.tsx
scripts.gen:arrow_chevron: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/arrow_chevron.glb --output generated_components/arrow_chevron.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js generated_components/arrow_chevron.tsx
scripts.gen:arrows: npm run gen:arrow && npm run gen:arrow_chevron
scripts.gen:models: npm run gen:city && npm run gen:taxi && npm run gen:tutorial
scripts.gen:all: npm run gen:models && npm run gen:presents
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi && cp -r out/* ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi/ && echo 'Deployed to intervolz.com/crazytaxi'
